#text=I needed a hair cut one day .
#text=It had been quite a while since my last cut , and the ends of my hair were starting to look uneven and ragged .
#text=While I was driving one day , I found a sign for a haircut for only $ 5 .
#text=I decided to go ahead and stop in for a quick trim .
#text=I went inside and signed my name on the waiting list .
#text=I found a chair to sit in and looked around .
#text=There were a lot of people there !
#text=It must have been because of the great deal on the hair cut .
#text=Because it was busy , I had to wait a while , but eventually my name was called .
#text=I told the beautician I had my hair cut not that long before and just wanted my ends to be cleaned up so my hair looked better .
#text=She put a cape around my shoulders and took me to wash my hair .
#text=After washing my hair , she cut off a half of an inch and used a blow dryer .
#text=I paid for my haircut , left a tip for the beautician , and left the salon feeling light and beautiful .
